title: Do discount stores handle the same tire as other stores? - Quora

response.answer_text: Whether it’s a discount store or any other store, you will get the same quality tire you are looking for. The only difference is that one is offered at a discounted price, while the other store charges a premium for it. So why should you pay a high price for the same tire you can get at a discount at Princess auto. When purchasing car parts, it’s important to go to a reliable and recognized store known for selling quality car parts. If you are looking for a good quality tire at an affordable rate, Princess auto is where you should go.
